alternativeNames: Kudrjaschew, Serafim Nikolajevich; Kudryaschov, Serafim Nikovayevich
examples: Fedtschenkiella Kudr.,  Bot. Mater. Gerb. Bot. Inst. Uzbekistansk. Fil. Akad. Nauk S.S.S.R. 4: 3 (1941)
source: Lipshitz S.Yu. Russkie botaniki in Byull. Moskovsk. Obsch. Isp. Prir., Otd. Biol. &: 552 (1947); full name from letter by Dmitry Bochkov given as Lipschitz paper; Middle name spelling from Alexander B. Doweld (IFPNI)
